item.description:
How about a fabulous breakfast at Parker's Maple Barn and then a an easy hike after.  Parker's also has a nice little gift shop if you want to browse in there as well.  The hike is mostly straight  even walking.  We can make it longer and a little harder if we want.  It's the Palmer/Bartel Trial which is a short distance from the restaurant located off rt 13.  Bring water.

cell:  978-340-3381 (only if you really need to the day of the event)  any questions please email me.  Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait by the covered bridge to the right of the restarurant if your facing it.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Breakfast at Parkers and easy hike
